attributes.action: Ban The British National Party otherwise known as the BNP since it is a neo-Nazi style party and therefore threatens the very existance of a multi-cultural Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition urges the Prime Minister to ban the BNP for being a neo-Nazi style party that threatens the Muslim population of Britain

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
